exclusion.criterion: Children that are known to suffer from genetic/metabolic disorders that can cause steatosis- Wilson disease, hypothyroidism, autoimmune hepatitis, Alpha 1 antitrypsin.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Children infected with HBV or HCV, HAV.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Children that use medications that can cause liver steatosis- amiodarone, MTX, Corticosteroids
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Children with significant ethanol consumption ->10 gr per day for women and >20gr per day for men.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Obesity due to syndromes or monogenic disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: General withdraw criteria: If the participant withdraws his consent.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration, but is a child with significant ethanol consumption.
